scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on a journey. Saint Joseph, with a long beard and wearing a red tunic and brown boots, leads a white donkey. The Virgin Mary, cloaked in blue and wearing a veil, is seated on the donkey, holding the Christ Child, who is dressed in a reddish-gold tunic. They are depicted in an outdoor setting with a tree on the left and a mountainous landscape with trees in the background. The figures are rendered with gold halos, indicating their sacred status.
